skins.shipDescription: Iron Blood Type IXC submarine ¨C U-522.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm U-522, Type IXC sub, from the glorious 2nd U-boat Flotilla. You need long-distance commerce raiding, I'm your girl. Anti-sub escorts do put me in one helluva pickle, though. Anyways, keep those eyes peeled for my combat performance~
skins.acquisition: Hmm... you're the commander 'round here, eh? I'm U-522, Iron Blood submarine, reporting for duty. Anyhoo, heard this here port's like a party. I'm eager to join in on it. Heheheh~
skins.login: Always happy to see ya, Commander. Today's lookin' like it'll be fun.
skins.details: Hehe, been oglin' me for some time, haven'tcha, Commander? I noticed ages ago!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This tail connector's not just for show. When plugged into my rigging: bam, gives me perfect control.
skins.secretaryIdle2: When I'm fighting, you can stare at me to your heart's content, y'know? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle3: I just LOVE seeing my enemies squirming about, trying to get away from my attacks~ Ahahahah~!
skins.secretaryTouch: You feelin' like some hide and seek? I'm game. I always win, y'see.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Tail - no touch! Bad Commander! That's my sensitive spot!
